page.text: The marauding lion girl looms over your fallen form with a grin "You take what you beat, and that means you're mine. I'm going to enjoy you." she says, in a way that sounds worryingly but somewhat predictably predatory.

choice.text: it's just what it sounds like
not what it sounds like, she's whipping something out

page.text:
The tall and predatory cat
takes her time to undress you. Her gaze roving over your body as she strips you and you struggle futilely. Once she has you entirely exposed and bared in front of her she
smirks and lets her gaze drink in the sight afore she licks her lips "Oh outlander, you look delicious, if you taste as good as you look." she lets out a rumbling growl of delight and pulls you up into her embrace. Her ample bosom pressing against you as she licks over your face.

choice.text: $Or you could not eat me? maybe?
